pages.text: $(li)Basalt Deltas are a volcanic biome covered in ashes.$(br)$(li)They can be found in the Nether.$(br)$(li)This biome is composed mostly of Basalt, Blackstone and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/magma_block)Magma Blocks$(/l).

$(li)Not too many creatures can survive in this habitat, only $(l:patchouli:creatures/infernal_expansion/basalt_giant)Basalt Giants$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/magma_cube)Magma Cubes$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/straddler)Straddlers$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Basalt Deltas$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
